description: Gets a Databricks storage configuration for an account, both specified by ID.

storage_configuration_id.description: Databricks Account API storage configuration ID.

storage_configuration_name.description: The human-readable name of the storage configuration.

bucket_name.description: The name of the S3 bucket.

account_id.description: The Databricks account ID that hosts the credential.

creation_time.description: Time in epoch milliseconds when the storage configuration was created.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.
